pr_title: Submit widget query form before saving edit widget modal.

timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.bodyText: The widget prop can also be removed in WidgetQueryControls.test.jsx
timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.bodyText: The current implementation does not work as expected (the behaviour on save did not changed), looks the reason is that dirty is missing in this array.
timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.bodyText: You can use DEFAULT_TIMERANGE from views/Contsants here.
timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.message:
Submit widget query form before saving edit widget modal.

Before this change, a successful change to the timerange/stream
selection/query of a widget on a dashboard required submitting the
widget's search after the change and before clicking "Save". This was
unintuitive and unnecessarily complicated.

This change is now submitting the widget's query form when the user
clicks "Save" and the form is dirty, not requiring the user to have
submitted the form manually before.

Fixes #7922.
Removing unnecessary form element around events checkbox.
